class.rdfs:comment: The act of giving money in return for temporary use, but not ownership, of an object such as a vehicle or property. For example, an agent rents a property from a landlord in exchange for a periodic payment.
class.rdfs:label: RentAction

schema:landlord.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The owner of the real estate property.
schema:landlord.rdfs:label: landlord

schema:realEstateAgent.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The real estate agent involved in the action.
schema:realEstateAgent.rdfs:label: realEstateAgent
